Question: This person played the central role in the historical thriller Valkyrie released on December 25, 2008 to box office success.
Hints: In 1983, this person was part of the ensemble cast of The Outsiders.
David Miscavige, the head of the Church of Scientology, served as this person's best man.
In early May 2008, this person reappeared on The Oprah Winfrey Show to celebrate 25 years in the film business.
